Articles.Content: Because science.We just call them by name Coke,Fanta,Some cheap crap.

I have no idea...
Y'all dont know a good coke until you have tried Guarana

Got some more stuff done.

Sabre is 200m/s short of orbital(It shouldn't take 3100m/s to get to orbit from 23km)Anyone want to take a shot http://www./download/ve3jv2rlxescgxg/Sabre.craft

Return system for the interplanetary transport works a charm it will work even better when it isn't full of fuel.(did a crew supply mission to a carrier broke off both engines upon landing otherwise good flipped when I braked though nobody died,lesson:don't slam the brakes on a 40 ton ship travelling at 63m/s:()
never heard of it more of a root beer or ginger ale kind of guy.

It's a Brazilian coke

It has a taste like cherry coke mixed with ginger ale

Got some more stuff done.

Is Kerbpaint updated/working better with hyper edit now?
Works fine for me and daemon,why were you having issues?.There wasn't even a new version.
I havent tested it yet so I cant say im having problems. I just thought that it affected battles or did you just use it for photo purposes?
then Zekes steal the candy from the armless baby. Im waiting on your reply.
I don't get what you mean.The mod doesn't cause issues if you download a persist/.craft which was painted it just reverts the colours to stock.
Ok, Zekes if its so easy to shoot a unarmed fuel tanker, then why haven't you sent me the persistence for my turn back?

Zekes...Are you scared?

@below:Nope sometimes persists get corrupted but that has only happened once so far.

I don't get what you mean.The mod doesn't cause issues if you download a persist/.craft which was painted it just reverts the colours to stock.

I thought you had said it did affect armor and physics. Oh well forget what I said
I really just want to get to the part where i blow his things up :/

So, Camulus777, have you tried out my ships? I hope they are decent enough for use.

EDIT: Wow, that's a lot of pop. (English name for soda)

I like the style and the size i was looking to build some similar sized ships for lighter frigates and a corvette the replace the Drache Star. The fuel is a bit low but that's ez to fix. Also they are easy to launch legit.
What is taking zekes so long... I need a reason to blow something up that isnt mine....

@Camulus

Thanks, I haven't tried launching them legitimately myself, simply because they are around about 160 parts, and I get 10 FPS on that as it is on my laptop. Oddly though, if I hyperedit a Burai and an Icaruaga into the same place in orbit, my FPS doesn't get any worse. The Idea was for the Escorts to be able to "Escort" a ship anywhere other than Moho, and possibly Eeloo. With Vall as my home base, they shouldn't need much fuel to get anywhere around Jool, though. After all, they both have Approx 4000ms-1 of Delta V.

EDIT: Do we fight with airplanes on this thread, like bombing runs and stuff? Because I am working on an attack VTOL, and it is going quite well.
It is kinda hard to do air battles seeing as hitting with planes is near impossible at the speeds they get going, and VTOL takes some getting used to.
Aircraft could be used as Support for Ground and Naval battles, Such as Bombers or Fighter Bombers

In the south we call all "soda" coke.

Capital C for Coka Cola

Not everyone in the South says "Coke". I say "Soda". Some people from the North say "Pop". (not a European thing)

But most people in the South do say "Coke" (short for "Coca-Cola" no "k"). Most people in the South can barely speak English even. Dx
